thread.section_title: Artmill Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Artmill | artmill.com | 2 of 6
thread.title: Tim Bonnette

author: Tim Bonnette
title: Tim Bonnette
text: I have been using Artmill for a few years now both as an ameture and professional photographer. The quality of the produced product has no equal wether you're a pro on a high scale project or simply working with snapshots from a cell phone. What I find as equally important is the one on one customer service that is provided as well. There is no guess work with Artmill. If you have needs they will work with you. If they are unclear on your request they reach out. I will use them again and highly recommend them to anyone looking to produce images in a variety of mediums.
